message: Just started playing with CoffeeScript and i can't get around how messy it handles scopes? anyone else?

data.message: Ye, this is the only horrible thing and it gets messy in coffee script. I prefer Pure Javascript though.

it cool to use coffee script if you have a small task but for making maintainable code i don't really recommend it as it converts in Chaos :S

Go for backbone it's really good. Also Angular looks really promising. try to make widgets and classes and only have one controller to control them all :)
